changeSet.author: Andrea Battaglia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.stationhistory ( id bigint NOT NULL, city character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL, country character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL, imported_on timestamp without time zone NOT NULL, latitude double precision NOT NULL, longitude double precision NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT stationhistory_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT location_idx UNIQUE (city, country) ) TABLESPACE pg_default;

CREATE TABLE public.rawtelemetryhistory ( id uuid NOT NULL, city character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", count integer, country character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", date date, max double precision, median double precision, min double precision, specie character varying(255) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", variance double precision, CONSTRAINT rawtelemetryhistory_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) ) TABLESPACE pg_default;

CREATE INDEX rawtelemetryhistory_search_idx ON public.rawtelemetryhistory USING btree (date ASC NULLS LAST, country COLLATE pg_catalog."default" ASC NULLS LAST, city COLLATE pg_catalog."default" ASC NULLS LAST, specie COLLATE pg_catalog."default" ASC NULLS LAST) TABLESPACE pg_default;
CREATE SEQUENCE public.hibernate_sequence INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1;
